titleStmt.title: His Maiesties speach in the vpper house of Parliament, on Munday the 26. of March, 1621
Speeches. 1621-03-26
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A" within part of an ornament.
Running title reads: His Maiesties speach in Parliament.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
